p: Formvar/carbon 200 Mesh Cu grids were glow-discharged in air and loaded with 3.0 μL of MVA viral sample encoding prME ΔTM. Excess liquid was removed, and the grids were washed three times with MilliQ water. Finally, grids were treated with 2% uranyl acetate for 30 s, excess uranyl acetate was carefully removed using filter paper. The grids were air dried and analysed with a T12 transmission electron microscope (FEI, Eindhoven, The Netherlands).
